advancement.trading_floor.drop_shipper.d: Generate 64 emeralds from a single trading depot
advancement.trading_floor.happy_jeff.des: Generate 1000 emeralds from a single trading depot
advancement.trading_floor.money_money_mo: Make a trade automatically using a trading depot
block.trading_floor.trading_depot.toolti: Trade with Villagers, note that villagers will _only trade during normal working times of day_.
trading_floor.jei.missing_disclaimer: Some trades may be missing or inaccurate when working with other mods
trading_floor.ponder.trading_depot_doubl: To complete trades with multiple inputs, 2 depots can be used together
While not required, you should set the filter on the first input to avoid other trades
Note that trading depots will only share contents if they have matching filters, or the other is empty
The output then goes to whichever depot has the first item of the trade
trading_floor.ponder.trading_depot_tradi: To use a trading depot, attach it to a villager workstation
When a villager next works at their workstation they will trade with the attached depot
